entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 04:38 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
